__e: Sound like some vengeful Simon Says bullshit, if you ask me.
Hey, hey, hey, hey. I think the brown hornet's Tryin' to tell us something.
I didn't say, "Simon says." I said, "He says." [CROWD GROANS]
Caused Jacques to make noises that no man should ever have to make unless he's actually dying.
Hey, hey, hey, hey. I think the brown hornet's Tryin' to tell us something.
I didn't say, "Simon says." I said, "He says." [CROWD GROANS]
They make covenant with the Devil in the shape of Black Phillip.
Black Phillip saith I can do what I like.
Well, I heard him talking to this guy, Jacques, the night he left.
Jacques, it is a pleasure to be working for your father again.
- Old Bob? - Père Jacques, my uncle Jacques-Bob. I've always called him Old Bob.
So, if I've understood Jacques is not your dad?
